QuestData.Title: In Defense of Krom'gar Fortress
QuestData.Description: There's no time left. Here they come! Take control of a heavy gun and shoot the gnomes out of the sky! If that bomb takes too many hits it will blow, taking us all with it!$B$BDefend the base, $n! You're our only hope!$B$BIf we somehow make it out of this in one piece, report to Overlord Krom'gar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 15 Gnomish Flying Machines or Bombers and 25 Gnome Wing Commanders.
